朚字的基本解释

朚
huāng
翌日；明日。

朚
máng
古同“忙”，遽；急忙。
古同“盲”。

朚
wáng
忘。

朚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huāng］
［《集韻》呼光切，平唐，曉。］
翌日，明日。
[②]［máng］
［《廣韻》莫郎切，平唐，明。］
(1)同“忙”。急忙。
(2)同“盲”。
[③]［wáng］
［《廣韻》武方切，平陽，微。］
忘。
[④]［mèng］
［《廣韻》莫更切，去映，明。］
义未详。

朚字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【月字部】　朚； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页505第28
【廣韻】呼光切，音荒。【說文】作?，翌也。从朙亡聲。　又【廣韻】莫郞切【集韻】謨郞切，?音茫。【博雅】遽也。

朚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
朚字的起名意思

暂无。

huāng
The next day; tomorrow.
Bright
máng

Gu Tong is "blind".

wáng
forget.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huāng］
["Jiyun" Huguangqie, Ping Tang, Xiao. ]
The next day, tomorrow.
[②]［máng］
["Guangyun" Mo Langqie, Ping Tang, Ming. ]
(1) Same as "busy". hastily.
(2) Same as "blind".
[③]［wáng］
["Guangyun" Wu Fangqie, Pingyang, Wei. ]
forget.
[④]［mèng］
["Guangyun" must not be more cut, go to film, Ming. ]
The meaning is unclear.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Moon Character Department] 　朚; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 505 28
[Guang Yun] Huguang cut, sound shortage. [Said the text] For?, Yi Ye. From the sound of death.　[Guangyun] Mo Yunqie [Jiyun] Mo Yunqie, the sound is vast. [Bo Ya] Suddenly.
